ygData.subject: Re: AC vs Stat enhancing armor
ygData.msgSnippet: yeah i know the feeling....without my stuff, i lose a little over 2 bars of mana........that s 2 c heals there.....and about 3 sup heals.......makes a huge
ygData.messageBody:
yeah i know the feeling....without my stuff, i lose a little over 2 bars
of mana........that's 2 c heals there.....and about 3 sup
heals.......makes a huge difference (:

Ralph Carothers wrote:

>
>
> I'd have to say stat enhancing armor is MUCH better than mana
> increasing.(unless 50+ mana)
> You wisdom increases your overall mana if your a cleric. My
> unmodified is 95 wis. With my wis increasing items (a slew of them at
> 24) I have 136. and i lose ONE full mana bubble if I remove my
> items! (and its one full mana bub to cast greater heal!!!)
